channel.title: Auto Cast Barrage

item.title: Auto Cast Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

This is what my code looks like:

[code=java]MageAttackIndex = player Indexx + 1;

       if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1) {
           if(ancientStaff) {magicID = 12891;}
           if(mageTimer <= 0) {
              AttackMage(PlayerIndexx);
              mageTimer = 9;
           }
       } else {
            sendMessage(
                    "This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked");
        }

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 04:03:43 pm[/size][hr]Well, I just just looking at deltascapes java. And seen nothing about auto casting.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Cast Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:18, topic:273389”][quote author=Rickpwns link=topic=361296.msg2748084#msg2748084 date=1239745686]

What the hell are you doing?

Trying to get this damn ice barrage to auto cast with ancient staff.

Here is the code I’m using,

if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1) { if(ancientStaff) {magicID = 12891;} if(mageTimer <= 0) { AttackMage(PlayerIndexx); mageTimer = 9; } } else { sendMessage( "This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked"); }
[/quote]
Good luck. I think you spelled ‘index’ wrong… :S[/quote]
That’s how I was told to spell it?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Cast Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:6, topic:273389”]Wowwwwwww I know what I did wrong. Silly me =]
magicID = 12891. Gotta declare it, not check it =D
Sorrryyyyyyyy
Put it IN the METHOD AttackMage(String Index)[/quote]
So I change my “PlayerIndexx” To “String Index”?

This is the Code I do:

[code=java]
MageAttackIndex = playerIndexx + 1;

       if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1) {
           if(ancientStaff) {magicID = 12891;}
           if(mageTimer <= 0) {
              AttackMage(Player Indexx);
              mageTimer = 9;
           }
       } else {
            sendMessage(
                    "This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked");
        }[/code]

And this is the error I get.

item.title: Auto Cast Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Alright, well I’m trying to get this right with barrage so I can auto cast it. It’s not working how I want it to, when I go to compile, it says It’s not a statement? Check it out.

if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1) { if(ancientStaff) {magicID == 12891} if(mageTimer <= 0) { AttackMage(playerIndexx); mageTimer = 5; } } else { sendMessage( "This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked"); }

Read full topic
